documentation.text:
@dev Get operating status of contract
     * @return A bool that is the current operating status

@dev Sets contract operations on/off
     * When operational mode is disabled, all write transactions except for this one will fail

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can perform this operation"

arguments.value: Only the owner can perform this operation

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can perform this operation"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The new Owner cannot be address 0"

arguments.value: The new Owner cannot be address 0

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The new Owner cannot be address 0"
